_A_DROPDOWN_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The ADropdown component is a dropdown component for Vue.js that allows you to display a list of actions in a dropdown menu. This documentation provides information on how to use the component and describes the available props.
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_BUTTON_CLASS_DESCRIPTI: The class of the dropdown button can be customized using the button-class prop.
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_BUTTON_ICONS_DESCRIPTI: Icons before and after the text of the dropdown button can be customized using the props button-icon-left and button-icon-right.
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_BUTTON_LOADING_DESCRIP: The loading state of the dropdown button can be customized using the props button-loading and button-loading-align.
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_BUTTON_TEXT_DESCRIPTIO: This documentation describes the button-text prop, which allows you to customize the text of the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_CARET_ICON_DESCRIPTION: The dropdown's caret icon can be customized.
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_HAS_CARET_DESCRIPTION_: The ADropdown component for Vue.js allows you to customize the display of the caret icon. This documentation describes the has-caret prop, which controls whether the caret icon is displayed or not.
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_IN_BODY_DESCRIPTION_: The in-body prop controls whether the dropdown content should be rendered in the body or directly after the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_IN_BODY_HEADER_: Dropdown Content in Body or Directly After Dropdown Button
_A_DROPDOWN_GROUP_TRIGGERS_DESCRIPTION_: The ADropdown component for Vue.js provides the ability to customize the triggers for the dropdown. This documentation describes the triggers prop, which defines the array of triggers.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_CLASS_: This prop allows you to customize the class of the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_ICON_LEFT_: These props enable you to display the icon before the text of the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_ICON_RIGHT_: These props enable you to display the icon after the text of the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_LOADING_: This prop allows you to control the loading state of the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_LOADING_ALIGN_: This prop allows you to adjust the position of the loading state within the button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_TEXT_: This prop allows you to customize the text of the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_CARET_ICON_: This prop allows you to customize the caret icon of the dropdown.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_HAS_CARET_: This prop allows you to specify whether the caret icon should be displayed in the dropdown component.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_IN_BODY_: This prop allows you to control whether the dropdown content should be rendered in the body or directly after the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_TRIGGERS_: Allows setting triggers that display the dropdown menu.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_ACTIONS_DESCRIPTION_: A list of actions to choose from.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_ATTRIBUTES_DESC: Additional attributes for customizing the dropdown button. The attributes are passed as an object containing the names of the desired attributes and their corresponding values.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_CLASS_DESCRIPTI: Specifies an additional class for the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_ICON_ATTRIBUTES: Additional attributes for the dropdown button icon. The attributes are passed as an object containing the names of the desired attributes and their corresponding values.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_ICON_CLASS_DESC: Specifies an additional class for the dropdown button icon.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_ICON_LEFT_DESCR: Defines the icon on the left side of the dropdown button. The icon name is passed as a string, or different icons for different devices can be defined as an object.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_ICON_RIGHT_DESC: Defines the icon on the right side of the dropdown button. The icon name is passed as a string, or different icons for different devices can be defined as an object.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_ICON_TAG_DESCRI: Specifies a custom HTML tag for the dropdown button icon.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_IS_TITLE_HTML_D: Determines whether the tooltip displayed on mouse hover over the link will be in plain text or HTML format.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_LOADING_DESCRIP: Displays a loading indicator on the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_LOADING_ALIGN_D: CSS positioning of the loading indicator on the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_LOADING_CLASS_D: CSS class for the dropdown button loading indicator.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_PREVENT_DESCRIP: Determines whether the default behavior of event handlers for the dropdown button will be prevented.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_STOP_DESCRIPTIO: Specifies whether further event propagation for the dropdown button will be stopped.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_TAG_DESCRIPTION: Specifies the HTML tag to be used for the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_TEXT_DESCRIPTIO: A string or object containing the dropdown button text for different devices. The keys 'mobile' and 'desktop' are used to define the appropriate text for each device.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_TEXT_ARIA_HIDDE: Determines whether the dropdown button text will be hidden from screen readers.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_TEXT_CLASS_DESC: CSS class for the dropdown button text.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_TEXT_SCREEN_REA: Dropdown button text for screen readers.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_TITLE_DESCRIPTI: One or more additional pieces of information that will be displayed when hovering over the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_BUTTON_TITLE_PLACEMENT: The position relative to the dropdown button where the tooltip will be displayed. It only works if is-title-html is set to true.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_CARET_ICON_DESCRIPTION: Caret icon next to the dropdown button. The default is a downward arrow.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_CLASS_DESCRIPTION_: Additional CSS class for the dropdown menu.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_DROPDOWN_ATTRIBUTES_DE: Additional dropdown attributes that are not defined as props.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_DROPDOWN_CLASS_DESCRIP: Additional CSS class for the dropdown menu.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_DROPDOWN_RENDER_DEFAUL: Determines whether the dropdown menu will initially be open. The default value is false.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_DROPDOWN_TAG_DESCRIPTI: Specifies the HTML tag to be used for dropdown menu elements. The default value is ul.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_ELEMENTS_FOR_ARROWS_DE: Defines the elements that can be navigated with the arrows within the drop-down menu.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_EXTRA_DESCRIPTION_: Additional values used for insertion into translations.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_FLOATING_FLIP_DESCRIPT: Configuration for the flip function. It optimizes the visibility of the dropdown menu by changing its position along the x-axis to keep it in view when the preferred position is out of bounds.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_FLOATING_SHIFT_DESCRIP: Configuration for the shift function. It optimizes the visibility of the dropdown menu by changing its position along the y-axis to keep it in view when the preferred position is out of bounds.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_HAS_CARET_DESCRIPTION_: Determines whether there is an icon next to the dropdown button. The default value is true.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_ID_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies a unique ID for the HTML element corresponding to the dropdown menu.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_IN_BODY_DESCRIPTION_: Determines whether the content of the dropdown menu is generated in the body or immediately after the dropdown button.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_IS_CLOSE_BY_CLICK_INSI: Determines whether the component will close when the user clicks inside it.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_IS_CLOSE_BY_CLICK_OUTS: Determines whether the component will close when the user clicks outside it.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_IS_HIDE_WITHOUT_ACTION: Determines whether the dropdown menu will exist at all if there are no selectable options or defined slots.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_IS_LIST_WIDTH_SAME_WIT: Determines whether the width of the dropdown button is the same as the width of the selection list.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_LOCK_ARROWS_NAVIGATION: Determines whether arrow key navigation within the dropdown menu is allowed.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_LOCK_TAB_NAVIGATION_DE: Determines whether Tab key navigation within the dropdown menu is allowed.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_PERSIST_DESCRIPTION_: Determines whether the dropdown menu will remain open after the user interacts with other elements until explicitly closed.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_PLACEMENT_DESCRIPTION_: The position at which the dropdown menu will open.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_POPPER_CONTAINER_ID_DE: ID of the container element that holds the dropdown menu options.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_TRIGGERS_DESCRIPTION_: A list of events that trigger the opening or closing of the dropdown menu.
_A_DROPDOWN_PROPS_USE_ESCAPE_DESCRIPTION: Determines whether the Esc key can be used to close the dropdown menu.
